name: sugar and napalm prototype
description:
for years, philosophers have pondered the question: what if your ammo was also your health?

now, their dreams can come true.

do you want to run away from sigma, the scary guy? how about kill ugly enemies. and be a cute duck? well have i got the game for you, bucko! in this bad, evil, stinky prototype, you can do all of these things and more! make sure to never miss, because you will die if you lose all your ammo!

the final game will be much better and much longer. it will have a cartoony art style, not this ms paint garbage. it will also have a story
